name: North End Grill's Bloody Bull
description: Here's a beefy take on the Bloody Mary. Rich beef stock goes into the tomato base with a roasted shishito pepper sitting on top.
recipeIngredient: 16 ounces North End Grill Bloody Mary Mix
2 ounces (4 tablespoons) fresh lemon juice from 2 to 3 lemons

recipeInstructions.text: Combine bloody mary mix, beef stock vodka, and lemon juice in a pitcher filled with ice. Stir until well chilled. Serve in individual ice-filled glasses, garnished with shishito peppers.
